reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: RAFFORZAMENTO ISTITUZIONALE PER UN'INNOVATIVA STRATEGIA DI SVILUPPO RURALE IN GIORDANIA

description.narrative:
CIHEAM Bari is proposing this intervention that aims to strengthening the Jordanian Ministry of Agriculture (MoA) services through innovative approach for a competitive rural development. The project aims to improve the capacity of the agriculture ministry technicians to analyse problems/ situations and to correctly design plan of actions and intervention, based on the needs of the Ministry and of the rural communities
The project will also improve the capacity of the MoA officials to design new and innovative agriculture/rural policies for an improvement of the competitiveness of the Jordanian agriculture in an international scenario and for an integrated rural development.
A pilot intervention will be implemented by the Ministry of Agriculture, assisted by the program, for the empowerment of the rural women conditions through the creation of rural women association to implement income generating activities

Nell'ambito del progetto, il CIHEAM assisterà il MoA giordano nel processo di revisione delle politiche agricole e rurali, della legislazione di settore e della ristrutturazione del suo staff per essere più adeguato alle correnti necessità ed alle nuove sfide che l’Agricoltura Giordana sta affrontando.

AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development
CIHEAM - CENTRO INTERNAZIONALE DI ALTI STUDI AGRONOMICI MEDITERRANEI

organisation.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

tag.narrative: By 2030, double the agricultural productivity and incomes of small-scale food producers, in particular women, indigenous peoples, family farmers, pastoralists and fishers, including through secure and equal access to land, other productive resources and inputs, knowledge, financial services, markets and opportunities for value addition and non-farm employment

By 2030, ensure sustainable food production systems and implement resilient agricultural practices that increase productivity and production, that help maintain ecosystems, that strengthen capacity for adaptation to climate change, extreme weather, drought, flooding and other disasters and that progressively improve land and soil quality
End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture
